nodes.text: Kardoa was a rocky planet in the galaxy. Three weeks after the bombing at the Jedi Temple, Jedi Master Depa Billaba and Padawan Caleb Dume went to Kardoa to confirm or deny a Separatist presence. When the Jedi and their clone trooper battalion encountered Separatist forces, a skirmish ensued.
In the opening crawl for Kanan 10, Kardoa is mistakenly referred to as Kaller.
